meanings.definition: A unit of data transfer rate equal to 1,000 bits per second.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a file at a speed of 500 kilobits per second.
meanings.sent2: The internet plan offers a speed of 100 kilobits per second.
meanings.sent3: My computer is so slow, it feels like it's processing data at a snail's pace of kilobits.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced through her mind at a million kilobits per second.
meanings.sent5: The information flowed into his brain like a river of kilobits.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for digital information storage, equal to 1,000 bits.
meanings.sent1: The USB drive has a storage capacity of 16 kilobits.
meanings.sent2: The email attachment size is only a few kilobits.
meanings.sent3: I have so many ideas in my head, it's like my brain is a kilobits warehouse!
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a kilobits library, storing vast amounts of information.
meanings.sent5: The cloud storage can hold kilobits of data effortlessly.
